sentences.en: Also , DDES can interdict the attack sources working in network edge service in the same time.
sentences.cn: 同时配合网络边缘设备对攻击源实施阻断.

sentences.en: He was threatened with a papal interdict.
sentences.cn: 他受到被罗马教皇草除教籍的威胁.

sentences.en: Interdict could also be sought for the protection of public interests.
sentences.cn: 禁令也可以用于保护公共利益.

sentences.en: Officials devote substantial efforts to interdict the illegal movement of travelers through Taipei's international airport.
sentences.cn: 官方做出相当大的努力,阻止在台北国际机场非法过境.

sentences.en: The bishop commanded them under pain of interdict.
sentences.cn: 主教指挥他们,若不从将被停止教权.

sentences.en: The defendant did not obey the interdict.
The National Trust has placed an interdict on jet-skis in Dorset, Devon and Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 国民托管组织已颁布禁令，禁止在多塞特、德文与康沃尔地区使用水上摩托艇。

sentences.en: Troops could be ferried in to interdict drug shipments.
sentences.cn: 可以把军队渡运过来阻截毒品的装运。

sentences.en: We are working very hard to create a mechanism where we can interdict North Korean shipments.
sentences.cn: 我们正在很努力地创造出一种可以阻止朝鲜航运的机制.

trans.tran_cn: 正式禁止，禁令，（罗马天主教）停止（某人）教权的禁令，停止某地参加圣事活动

trans.tran_en: If an armed force interdicts something or someone, they stop them and prevent them from moving. If they interdict a route, they block it or cut it off.
